Kubi Chaza Indi bụ onye Zimbabwe na-akwado mmepe na nwanyị na-azụ ahịa
N'okpuru aha nwa agbọghọ ya, Kubi Chaza, ọ bụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri na United Kingdom, na-apụta na Live and Let Die na 1973 dị ka onye na-ere ahịa na-ejere James Bond ozi
Mgbe ọ laghachiri Zimbabwe, ya na di ya na-eme ihe nkiri bụ John Indi malitere ụlọ ọrụ na-emepụta ihe ịchọ mma.
Indi na-arụsi ọrụ ike na obodo mmepe, ọkachasị n'ihe gbasara okwu metụtara ụmụ nwanyị, ma bụrụkwa odeakwụkwọ ukwu nke otu Indigenous Business Women's Organisation naZimbabwe.
Ndị Indis anọgidewo na-arụ ọrụ na ịme ihe nkiri, John dị ka onye na-eme ihe nkiri, mana Kubi n'akụkụ abụọ nke igwefoto
N'afọ 1989, o mepụtara I Am the Future, ihe nkiri banyere otu nwa agbọghọ (nke Stella Chiweshe mere) nke na-aga nnukwu obodo iji gbanahụ agha nnwere onwe nke Zimbabwe n'ime ime obodo
N'afọ 1993, o mere onye agbata obi nke oge a na Neria, edemede Tsitsi Dangarembga banyere nwanyị di ya nwụrụ na Zimbabwe
Godwin Mawuru duziri ihe nkiri abụọ ahụ, Neria gosipụtara ụda olu nke Oliver Mtukudzi.
TryIndi bụ onye otu Women Filmmakers of Zimbabwe
Ọrụ ya dị ka nwa agbọghọ na-ere ahịa na ụlọ ahịa Oh Cult Voodoo bịara mgbe ọ nọ na UK, ọ malitere ịrụ ọrụ ahụ
Àgwà ya dị ka nwa agbọghọ na-ere ahịa na-ejere James Bond ozi (nke Roger Moore na-egwu), na-ekpuchi ihe maka ya wee kpọọ Mister Big mgbe Bond hapụrụ ụlọ ahịa ahụ.
Mgbe Zimbabwe nwechara nnwere onwe, Indi na di ya John laghachiri n'obodo ahụ
N'ebe ahụ ka ha malitere ụlọ ọrụ ha na-emepụta ihe ịchọ mma nke a na-akpọ Kubi Cosmetics
Ugbu a ọ bụ akara ama ama na South Africa
Ọ na-emepụta ngwaahịa ndị na-emepụta kpọmkwem maka akpụkpọ anụ na ntutu isi nke Afrika.
